original_title: Les Dawson: An Audience With That Never Was
overview: On the 20th anniversary of the comedian's untimely death, ITV decided to mark the occasion with the use of a technology which gave the illusion that he was on stage. Revisit the original content planned for that show, and uniquely present it for a celebrity studio audience specially invited to enjoy the very best of Les Dawson.
title: Les Dawson: An Audience With That Never Was
